dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of packages that represents the official suite of
DOE/ECP proxy applications. This is a Spack bundle package that installs
the ECP proxy application suite.
dependent_to.name: ecp-proxy-apps

description:
AMG is a parallel algebraic multigrid solver for linear systems arising
from problems on unstructured grids. The driver provided with AMG builds
linear systems for various 3-dimensional problems.
name: amg2013

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
